definition.name: Setup Ruby
definition.description: Set up a specific version of Ruby and add the command-line tools to the PATH
definition.author: GitHub

inputs.name: ruby-version
inputs.description: Version range or exact version of a Ruby version to use.

inputs.name: version
inputs.description: Deprecated. Use ruby-version instead. Will not be supported after October 1, 2019

evidence.reasoning: This action is primarily focused on setting up a specific version of Ruby, which is essential for managing dependencies in a project. It also plays a role in the build process by ensuring the correct Ruby environment is available.
